thread.title: Four killed, over 600 arrested in Punjab Rangers raids
thread.title_full: Four killed, over 600 arrested in Punjab Rangers raids

author: News Desk
title: Four killed, over 600 arrested in Punjab Rangers raids
text:
Share Tweet Email 
Punjab Rangers have carried out over 200 raids as part of the ongoing countrywide Operation Radd-ul-Fasaad, the militaryâ€™s media wing said on Saturday. 
According to Inter-Services Public Relations, at least four terrorists have been killed and more than 600 suspects, including Afghan nationals, have been arrested in search operations conducted in various areas of Punjab, including Karor, Layyah and Rawalpindi. 
Army mounts new nationwide offensive 
Those arrested include facilitators of Jamaatul Ahrar (JuA), which has claimed responsibility for the recent string of terrorist attacks across the country, ISPR said. It added that weapons and extremist material have also been recovered during the raids on houses, seminaries and shops suspected of being used by terrorists as hideouts.
